title: RA Sushi offers margarita variations with multiple flavor options
statement: RA Sushi serves Emperor's Margarita and Umami Margarita in multiple flavors including traditional, mango, cucumber, strawberry, and passion fruit.

citations.quote: EMPEROR'S MARGARITA Casamigos Blanco Tequila, Combier Liqueur d'Orange, lime juice, Japanese yuzu and agave néctar: Traditional Mango Cucumber Strawberry Passion Fruit
